meanings.sent1: The constant irksomeness of the dripping faucet drove me crazy.

meanings.sent3: The irksomeness of the squeaky door was finally fixed with a bit of oil.
meanings.sent4: The irksomeness of the buzzing mosquito was like a persistent itch in my mind.
